Info.Title: Lupin the 3rd
Info.Writer: Monkey Punch (manga), Mataichirô Yamamoto, Mataichirô Yamamoto (story), Ryûhei Kitamura (story), Joey O'Bryan (story)
Info.Actors: Shun Oguri, Jerry Yan, Tetsuji Tamayama, Gô Ayano
Info.Plot: The grandson of a legendary gentleman burglar assembles a team of thieves to steal a Cleopatran necklace from two parties - an ally-turned-rival, and an underworld tycoon.
